Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell added 24 points and seven assists
Cleveland led by as many as 28 points
Cleveland shot 17-of-22 from the floor in the first quarter and made 8 of 13 treys
Jarrett Allen finished with 20 points and 17 rebounds
Mobley scored 17 points in the fourth quarter
Mobley had eight points in the first two minutes of the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James was cheered throughout pre-game warm-ups and during his traditional pregame powder toss
A tribute video for James and rookie guard Bronny was played during the first half
LeBron finished with 26 points, six rebounds and six turnovers
The Cleveland crowd started chanting, ‘We Want Bronny’ shortly after LeBron went to the bench
Bronny entered with 5:16 left and the Cavaliers up 119-98
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland’s best start since the 2016-17 season, when LeBron James was wearing No. 23 for the Cavaliers
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron’s breakaway dunk in the first minute
Bronny assisted on Dalton Knecht’s dunk
Bronny scored his first NBA points on a step-back, 14-foot jumper over Tristan Thompson
